title: STK Steakhouse operates in multiple US states
statement: STK Steakhouse has locations across multiple US states including Colorado, D.C., Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Massachusetts, Nevada, North Carolina, Puerto Rico, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, and Washington.

citations.quote: Colorado Denver D.C. Washington DC Florida Aventura Orlando South Beach Georgia Atlanta Illinois Chicago Oak Brook Massachusetts Boston Nevada Las Vegas North Carolina Charlotte Puerto Rico San Juan Tennessee Nashville Texas Dallas Utah Salt Lake City Washington Bellevue
